title: Full Stack Developer | Laravel & Vue.js
Summary: Motivated Full Stack Developer specializing in Laravel and Vue.js. Experienced in building responsive web applications and scalable backend systems. Passionate about modern development tools, clean code, and continuous learning.
About: I'm Zakaria Azizi, a Full Stack Developer focused on creating intuitive digital experiences using Laravel, Vue.js, and modern web technologies. I enjoy turning complex problems into elegant solutions, always aiming for performance, scalability, and user satisfaction. My journey in development is driven by a deep interest in technology, design thinking, and collaboration. I'm currently honing my skills through personal and collaborative projects, always striving to learn and grow as a developer.
